game.name: Carnival Massacre
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park!
